name: Square Head Zombies 2 - FPS Game
description:
After kill all zombies in the first game, the zombie plague spread through the world, now you will face more enemies in Square Head Zombies 2.

You will face zombies that attack at short distance and from long distances, some are slow, others are extreme fast.

More zombies, more challenge.

Fight with zombies in shoppings, big cities, beaches, offices, farms. There is a lot of places that you will find enemies.

Game Features:

- Different type of zombies
- Ammo is not infinite anymore like in the first game, collect ammo through the levels to be able to kill all zombies
- New levels
- New achievements
